actionConfiguration.body:
WITH dates_added AS (
		SELECT DISTINCT	 CAST(datetime as date) AS date_,
					sum_twelve_hours
		FROM dbt."beer_stats"
		ORDER BY sum_twelve_hours DESC
),
max_per_date AS (
		SELECT DISTINCT max(sum_twelve_hours) OVER(PARTITION BY date_) as beer_liters,
		date_
		FROM dates_added
		ORDER BY beer_liters DESC
),
add_time AS (
	  SELECT CAST(min(bs.datetime) + interval '6 hours' AS time) as end_time,
					 CAST(min(bs.datetime) - interval '6 hours' AS time) as start_time,
					 bs.sum_twelve_hours,
					 mpd.date_ 
	FROM dbt."beer_stats" bs
	INNER JOIN max_per_date mpd
	ON CAST(bs.datetime AS date) = mpd.date_ 
	AND bs.sum_twelve_hours = beer_liters
	GROUP BY date_,
					 sum_twelve_hours
),
time_in_string AS (
		select sum_twelve_hours,
					 date_,
					 CONCAT(CAST(EXTRACT(hours FROM start_time) AS text),':',CAST(EXTRACT(minutes FROM start_time) AS text)) as start_time,
					 CONCAT(CAST(EXTRACT(hours FROM end_time) AS text),':', CAST(EXTRACT(minutes FROM end_time) AS text)) as end_time
		FROM add_time
)
select *
from time_in_string
ORDER BY sum_twelve_hours DESC
LIMIT 10
